title: Automatic Debiased Machine Learning via Riesz Regression
abstract: arXiv:2104.14737v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: A variety of interesting parameters may depend on high dimensional regressions. Machine learning can be used to estimate such parameters. However estimators based on machine learners can be severely biased by regularization and/or model selection. Debiased machine learning uses Neyman orthogonal estimating equations to reduce such biases. Debiased machine learning generally requires estimation of unknown Riesz representers. A primary innovation of this paper is to provide Riesz regression estimators of Riesz representers that depend on the parameter of interest, rather than explicit formulae, and that can employ any machine learner, including neural nets and random forests. End-to-end algorithms emerge where the researcher chooses the parameter of interest and the machine learner and the debiasing follows automatically. translated_title: 通过Riesz回归实现自动去偏的机器学习
translated_abstract: 一些有趣的参数可能依赖于高维回归。机器学习可以用来估计这些参数。然而，基于机器学习的估计器可能受到正则化和/或模型选择的严重偏差。去偏的机器学习使用Neyman正交估计方程来减少这些偏差。去偏的机器学习通常需要估计未知的Riesz代表。本文的主要创新是提供依赖于感兴趣参数的Riesz回归估计器，而不是显式公式，并且可以使用任何机器学习器，包括神经网络和随机森林。端到端算法涌现出来，研究人员选择感兴趣的参数和机器学习器，去偏操作随之自动进行。另一个创新是参数依赖于广义回归的去偏机器学习器。
tldr: 本文提出了一种通过Riesz回归实现自动去偏的机器学习方法，主要创新在于提供了依赖于感兴趣参数的Riesz回归估计器，以减少机器学习估计器受到正则化和模型选择偏差的影响，可适用于各种机器学习方法。
en_tdlr: The paper introduces an automatic debiased machine learning approach via Riesz regression, with a primary innovation of providing Riesz regression estimators depending on the parameter of interest to reduce biases introduced by regularization and model selection in machine learning estimators, applicable to various machine learning methods.
